column2: BRIEF-Dril-Quip Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.20 April 26 (Reuters) - Dril-Quip Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * COMPANYâ€™S BACKLOG WAS $207.3 MILLION AND $266.7 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 AND MARCH 31, 2018, RESPECTIVELY * DRIL-QUIP - ALTHOUGH INCREMENTAL PROJECT-BASED BOOKINGS ARE EXPECTED IN 2018, CO DOES NOT ANTICIPATE THESE BOOKINGS TO MATERIALLY AFFECT 2018 REVENUE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
